item.title: Bitmap Font (GODOT)
item.description: In this guide we’ll learn how to use our custom designed font image for our game. drawing font [libresprite] In this part, we will draw the characters needed for only “HELLO WORLD!”. In future, you can draw the required characters for your project with the similar logic.[1] Create 90x10 canvas. Fill the background with #ff00ff color. Create a new layer and draw a total of 9 8x8 pixel squares. Color: #0000ff There will be 2 pixel space between each square but 1 pixel from the corners.
